nodes.text: The rise of a free and self-governing Iraq will deny terrorists a base of operation discredit their narrow ideology and give momentum to reformers across the region.
America should rise a free and self-governing Iraq
This will be a decisive blow to terrorism at the heart of its power and a victory for the security of America and the civilized world
The blow to terrorism and the victory for the security of America are good consequences of the free and self-governing Iraq
American goal is to achieve the security and destroy terrorism
If I deny terrorists a base of operation terrosim will be seriously reduced
